subject: Management
title: Creating a Delegation Culture
description: Learn Creating a Delegation Culture in one minute.

hook.text: In one company, delegation was seen as laziness. Managers did everything themselves to look busy.

buildup.text: Culture shapes whether delegation is celebrated or punished. It starts at the top.

discovery.text: When leaders model delegation openly, it signals that empowering others is valued.

climax.text: Celebrate the manager whose team delivered, not the one who pulled an all-nighter alone.

punchline.text: Reward the team win, not the solo heroic.

quiz.question: What kills a delegation culture?
options: Rewarding managers who do everything themselves
